    • 方法详细资料

      • sell

        public VatSaleTransaction sell(Context<?> respCtx,
                      VatSaleTransaction clientSale)
                        throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: VatSaleService
        VAT amount can be used to buy raffle or magic100 ticket. Raffle ticket is for B2B retailer, and magic100 ticket is for B2C retailer.

        Though this service is extending from TicketService, its logic is completedly different from sale service of a real game, actually it is more understandable if regard this service as a front end of Raffle/Magic100 sale service, and the implementation of this service will definitely dispatch request to Raffle(B2B)/Magic100(B2C) sale service accordingly.

        Before dispatching request, this service will perform below operations:

        • Determine the business type of device. B2B or B2C??
        • if B2B
          1. No matter the VAT amount, a single raffle ticket will be sold.
          2. Record the VAT sale transaction VatSaleTransaction.
          3. Increment Vat sale balance.
        • If B2C
          1. Determine the total amount of sale by (vatAmount*vatRate), also round down/up will be considered. For example vatAmount is 800, vatRate is 0.3, the sale total amount will be 800*0.3=240, if round down, and base amount of magic100 is 100, then only 2 tickets can be sold(240/100=2.4, round down to 2).
          2. Record the VAT sale transaction VatSaleTransaction.
          3. Increment Vat sale balance.

        Pre-Condition

        • VAT is valid.
        • VAT has been allocated to current merchant

        Post-Condition

        • Record the general Transaction, in which the game type will be set to Raffle or Magic100 accordingly, also the total amount will be set to SALE total amount.
        • Record the detailed VatSaleTransaction.
        • Increment the VAT sale balance
        • Generate tickets which have been sold.

        Usage Restriction

        • Authorization - Can only be called by authorized GPEs.
        • Concurrent Access - To a single device, this interface must be called sequentially. To multiple devices, there are no limitation on the number of concurrent accesses.
        指定者:
        sell 在接口中 VatSaleService
        参数:
        respCtx - The context represents the response.
        clientSale - A client ticket request, a instance of VatTicket.
        返回:
        The sold ticket, either RAFFLE or MAGIC100.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • refundVat

        public void refundVat(Context<?> respCtx,
             VatSaleTransaction vatTrans)
               throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: VatSaleService
        Refund a VAT invoice. Customer can request to refund sales and the associated VAT invoice must be refunded as well, in essential it is same with the cancellation of VatSaleService.sell(Context, VatSaleTransaction).

        Refer to VatReversalOrCancelStrategy.cancelOrReverse(Context, com.mpos.lottery.te.trans.domain.Transaction)

        指定者:
        refundVat 在接口中 VatSaleService
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of current refunding transaction.
        vatTrans - The refunding request, the following components must be set: vatRefNo
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - if encounter any biz exception.

      • doSale

        protected BaseTicket doSale(Context respCtx,
                VAT vat,
                Vat2Game vat2Game,
                VatSaleTransaction vatSaleTransaction)
                     throws ApplicationException
        Buy a ticket based on supplied VAT. No matter B2B or B2C, both can join either Raffle or Magic100 game.
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of VAT sale.
        vat - The associated VAT.
        vat2Game - The association between VAT and game. It determines which game the VAT can join.
        vatSaleTransaction - THe VAT sale transaction which represents the VAT sale.
        返回:
        THe RAFFLE or MAGIC100 ticket, it depends on which game VAT has joined, or null if no need to buy a ticket.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • determineB2CTotalBets

        protected int determineB2CTotalBets(Context respCtx,
                        VAT vat,
                        VatSaleTransaction vatTrans,
                        java.math.BigDecimal baseAmount)
                             throws ApplicationException
        Determine the total bets of B2C game(magic100). The general formula of calculating total bets is as below: 
         double roughBets = (vat.totalAmount * vat.rate) / baseAmount
        For example, we have a case 
         vat.totalAmount = $940
 vat.rate = 10%
 baseAmount = $100
        in this case, the roughBets is (940 * 0.1) / 100 = 0.94

        If Round Up

        the total bets will be 
         int(roughBets) + 1
        and the totalBets in our example will be int(0.94) + 1 = 1

        If Round Down

        the total bets will be 
         int(roughBets)
        and the totalBets in our example will be int(0.94)= 0
        参数:
        respCtx - The vat sale context which represents the response
        vat - The VAT definition.
        vatTrans - The VAT sale transaction.
        baseAmount - The baseAmount of B2C game.
        返回:
        how many bets can be bought by player.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - if any business exception encountered.
